segments.lesson_summary: Summary of segment 4: The Ministry of Education, the Planning and Development Division for all sectors - a math curriculum for grade 3, examples and explanations. The subject of numbers in the field of place value. Large numbers will be gradually taught: hundreds, thousands, tens of thousands. Tens and hundreds were learned in grade 2. The decimal structure, representation of three-digit numbers in visual aids – for example, representing 10,000 on grid paper: a square with a half-meter side has 10,000 squares with a half-centimeter side.
